p: RBLE treatment was found can decrease the TNF-α level in liver injury model based on the study result. One of active compound in RBLE, eugenol, had been studied have effect on reduction of inflammatory cells infiltration and generation of cytokines from Kupffer cells include ability to suppress TNF-α level in liver injury model ( Yogalakshmi et al., 2010). Phenolic compound had anti-inflammatory effect as another study from Yuan et al. (2016) also stated that a phenolic compound ferulic acid could decrease the TNF-α level in mice induced with APAP.
